div.h6: Dear Community, distance learning will now continue to the end of the 2019 - 2020 school year. There will be no events, practices, or activities at the school during this time period. Only essential school personnel will be permitted on school property. We will continue to update the community as more information becomes available.

div.p: Click here for April 29, 2020 "Grab and Go" form. Grab and go food will be available at Tinora Elementary from 11-1 on Wednesday, April 29. There will be meals given...

Tinora Archery is pleased to report that Hailey Schultz has been named Middle School Girls Archery State Champion! Although a State Tournament was unable to be held,...

p.a: Event: HS OMEA State Contest (Band & Choir)

div.p:
Click on the following link for pick-up and drop off of items at Noble and TES
https://5il.co/fkbk

JH parents may come get their JH students possessions in front of the JH on Wednesday, April 29th from 11-1 or 5-7. Parents may also sign for a refund of money previously paid for the Cedar Point or Zoo field trips. Refunds not claimed this day will be placed on the student's lunch accounts for next school year. Student textbooks and library books may be turned in at this time as well. Please email Mrs. Maxwell at lmaxwell@tinora.org if you are unable to make it during these pick up times or have questions.

Tinora Archery is pleased to report that Hailey Schultz has been named Middle School Girls Archery State Champion! Haley's score from that tournament was the high score for Middle School Girls reported from around the state. The picture shows Hailey receiving her trophy and championship bow from Coach Spiller in the Tinora Elementary isolation area used for chromebook loans and repairs. CONGRATULATIONS HAILEY!
Meal Distribution Link for Wednesday, April 29th

ATTENTION: On Friday, April 24th, the Northeastern Local Schools bus drivers will be driving their regular PM route starting at 3:20pm from the school to see the kids! We would love for the kids to come outside their homes and wave as the bus drivers drive by! #TinoraTogether
